weapons.name: Crystal Shard Blade (Dagger)
weapons.description: A dagger made from a shard of the pulsating Crystal Spire. Once per day, its wielder can cause it to flare with power, dealing extra harm.

weapons.name: Void-Kissed Blade (Dagger)
weapons.description: A dark, obsidian dagger imbued with Void energy. On a critical hit, the target is afflicted with a debilitating, supernatural chill.

weapons.name: Blade of the Zephyr (Sword)
weapons.description: A lightweight sword crafted in Wyndia that feels almost weightless. It allows the wielder to strike with impossible speed.

weapons.name: Runeblade of the Scholar (Sword)
weapons.description: A light blade etched with runes that channel the wielder's mental energy. When you Know things about a creature you are fighting, take +1 forward on your next attack against it.

weapons.name: Earth-Wrought Blade (Greatsword)
weapons.description: A greatsword of blackened steel with swirling crystalline veins. It feels impossibly heavy, yet balanced. When you wield this weapon, you gain a +1 bonus to all Force checks.

weapons.name: Blade of the Unending Storm (Greatsword)
weapons.description: A colossal blade that crackles with contained lightning. On a successful hit, you can choose to deal 1 less harm to unleash a peal of thunder, disorienting all nearby enemies.

weapons.name: Sunforged Spear (Spear)
weapons.description: The tip of this spear glows with a faint, warm light. It deals holy damage, which is anathema to the undead and creatures of the void.

weapons.name: Harvester's Pike (Spear)
weapons.description: A grim-looking spear with a wicked, barbed tip. When you deal harm with it, the wound bleeds profusely, causing the target to take additional harm on their next turn.

weapons.name: Stonemason's Maul (Warhammer)
weapons.description: A warhammer used in the construction of Stonegard. It can shape earth as easily as it shatters it. Once per day, it can be used to cast a move as if you were Rya with the Earth lineage attuned.

weapons.name: The Tyrant's Gavel (Warhammer)
weapons.description: A fearsome warhammer that emits an aura of dread. When you Intimidate someone while holding it, you can use Force instead of Heart.

weapons.name: Grasping Gauntlets (Gauntlets)
weapons.description: These iron gauntlets are etched with runes of binding. When you strike a foe, you may immediately attempt to grapple them as a free action.

weapons.name: Gauntlets of the Stone Titan (Gauntlets)
weapons.description: Massive stone gauntlets that feel surprisingly light. When you Wreck something while wearing them, treat your roll as one category higher.

weapons.name: Stormvine Whip (Whip)
weapons.description: A living whip braided from storm-infused vines. On a critical hit, the vines instinctively lash out, attempting to grapple the target.

weapons.name: Grasping Ivy (Whip)
weapons.description: A legendary whip grown from a cutting of the purified Gloomwood Heart. It can be used to command nearby plants to ensnare a foe.

weapons.name: Wyndian Quill Bow (Shortbow)
weapons.description: A finely crafted shortbow made with Wyndian feathers that hums with wind magic. Arrows fired from it crackle with lightning.

weapons.name: Bow of the Silent Watcher (Shortbow)
weapons.description: A darkwood bow that makes no sound when fired. When you attack from hiding with this bow, you do not reveal your position on a miss.

weapons.name: Heartwood Longbow (Longbow)
weapons.description: A longbow carved from the heartwood of an ancient tree from the Whispering Woods. It guides the archer's hand, granting a +1 bonus to Finesse when making a Called Shot.

weapons.name: The Sky-Piercer (Longbow)
weapons.description: A bow crafted by the Skyveil to hunt armored mountain beasts. Arrows fired from it ignore 1 point of armor.

weapons.name: Inquisitor's Crossbow (Crossbow)
weapons.description: A heavy crossbow used by the Champions of Order. Its bolts are imbued with holy energy and are especially effective against magical creatures and dragons.

weapons.name: The Viper's Kiss (Crossbow)
weapons.description: A crossbow with a sickly green-black wood stock. Its bolts magically carry a debilitating poison that weakens the target's next action.

armor_and_shields.name: Whisper-weave Tunic (Light Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: A tunic woven with the silk of a Gloomfang Spider, enchanted to muffle sound. It negates the 'Noisy' tag from other pieces of armor.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Skin Vest (Light Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: A leather tunic reinforced with plates of rock from Scalebound territory. It fills the wearer with the resilience of the mountain, making them feel stronger.

armor_and_shields.name: Shadowpelt Jerkin (Medium Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: Armor made from the cured hide of a Shadowpelt beast. It is enchanted to move silently, negating the usual penalties for wearing armor when being stealthy.

armor_and_shields.name: Wyvern Scale Vest (Medium Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: A vest of tough, interlocking wyvern scales. It provides excellent protection and grants the wearer resistance to poisons.

armor_and_shields.name: Ember-Scale Armor (Heavy Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: A powerful suit of armor forged from the scales of a Cinder-Scale Tyrant. The wearer is immune to fire damage.

armor_and_shields.name: Bulwark of the Old Guard (Heavy Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: Masterwork plate armor from a bygone era. It is so well-balanced that it does not have the 'Clumsy' tag.

armor_and_shields.name: Bulwark of the Gatewarden (Heavy Shield)
armor_and_shields.description: A massive shield in the style of the Stonekin Gatewardens. When you use it to Stand Guard, you are considered an immovable object and cannot be pushed back.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Forged Aegis (Shield)
armor_and_shields.description: A shield of pure mountain stone, imbued with a ward of divine light. It provides exceptional protection against hostile magic.

robes_and_vestments.name: Oracle's Vestments
robes_and_vestments.description: Flowing, ethereal robes that seem to shimmer with unspoken prophecies. When you wear these, you gain a +1 to all Wits rolls to Sense things or Investigate a scene.

robes_and_vestments.name: Robes of the Flowing Mind
robes_and_vestments.description: Simple, elegant robes that help the wearer channel their magical energy. Once per scene, you can use a magical move without suffering its consequence on a 7-9.

foci.name: Channeler's Ring
foci.description: A simple copper ring that hums with a faint energy. When you wear this ring, you can unleash a minor bolt of pure magical force (1-harm, magical).

foci.name: Mindstone Ring
foci.description: A smooth, grey stone set in a simple iron band. It seems to sharpen the wearer's thoughts, granting a +1 bonus to their Wits attribute.

foci.name: Ring of Embers
foci.description: A ring of blackened steel that is always warm to the touch. When you wear this ring, you can unleash a bolt of searing fire (1-harm, magical, fire).

foci.name: Oracle's Gyre
foci.description: A spiraling ring of petrified wood and silver. Once per day, you can use it to mark a target with a terrible omen, causing them to falter and fail at their next significant action.

accessories.name: Tattered Map of the Azure Steppes
accessories.description: An old, worn map of the plains.
accessories.move: When you consult this map while Surveying the Azure Steppes, you can ask one additional question, even on a miss.

accessories.name: Talisman of Vitality
accessories.description: A wooden charm carved in the shape of a blooming flower. It radiates a gentle warmth.
accessories.move: Once per scene, when you take a moment to catch your breath, you can focus on the talisman to heal 1 Harm.

accessories.name: Charm of Resilience
accessories.description: A belt buckle made from the tooth of a great beast, it is said to grant the wearer the beast's tenacity.
accessories.move: Once per adventure, when you would be taken out of a scene, you can choose to remain with 1 Harm box left.

accessories.name: Amulet of Clarity
accessories.description: A polished silver amulet that seems to hum with a low, clear tone, warding off mental intrusion.
accessories.move: You gain a +2 bonus to all rolls to resist being deceived, having your mind read, or being magically controlled.

accessories.name: Golden Lure
accessories.description: A masterfully crafted fishing lure that glitters with an alluring, magical light.
accessories.move: When you go fishing, you can choose to use this lure. If you do, treat the result of your roll as one category higher.

consumables.name: Elderwood Poultice
consumables.description: A thick, earthy paste that grants a temporary +1 Armor for a scene.

consumables.name: Sun-Kissed Petal
consumables.description: A rare flower from the Azure Steppes that glows with a soft light.
consumables.move: When you consume this petal, you may clear 1 Harm and ask the GM a single question about your immediate future, which will be answered with a cryptic but truthful omen.

consumables.name: Moon Drop
consumables.description: A vial of liquid that shimmers like the night sky. It restores the body and clears the mind.
consumables.move: When you drink this, you heal 1 Harm and may remove one mental effect (like fear, confusion, or magical influence).

consumables.name: Firecracker
consumables.description: A tightly wrapped paper tube with a runic fuse. It explodes with a deafening bang and a shower of sparks.
consumables.move: When you throw this, you deal 1-harm (ap, fire) to all nearby enemies and put them in a bad spot.

consumables.name: Dragon Scale
consumables.description: A single, perfectly formed scale from an ancient dragon, humming with latent power.
consumables.move: When you crush this scale, its magic is released. You gain +1 Armor for the rest of the scene.

consumables.name: Panacea
consumables.description: A sparkling, effervescent liquid that seems to cure any ailment.
consumables.move: When you drink this, you are immediately cleared of all negative physical and magical effects (such as poison, disease, or curses).
